record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - October 03, 2007)

[Page: H11214]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 2740.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Michigan?
